annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m taking a look at a particularly potent libation: Dr. Funk. I’m not sure which legend to believe that follows this drink,...
annotations.title: Dr. Funk | How to Drink

textContent:
.5 oz or 15 ml Lemon Juice
.25 oz or 7 ml Grenadine
.5 oz or 15 ml Lime Juice
.5 oz or 15 ml Demerara Syrup
.25 oz or 7 ml Absinthe
2.225 oz or 67 ml Black Rum
1 oz or 30 ml Seltzer

Shake over Crushed Ice
Pour seltzer into double rocks glass
Open Pour into Double Rocks Glass
Garnish with Orchid and pineapple fronds

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rqyiCgnm7qA
title: Dr Funk
